text: أَتَّخَذْنَـٰهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ

translation.en.sahih: Is it [because] we took them in ridicule, or has [our] vision turned away from them?"
translation.id.indonesian: Apakah kami dahulu menjadikan mereka olok-olokan, ataukah karena mata kami tidak melihat mereka?"
